str2: Nicodemus, a member of the Sanhedrin. From nikos and demos; victorious among his people; Nicodemus, an Israelite.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular

str2: To, towards, with. A strengthened form of pro; a preposition of direction; forward to, i.e. Toward.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
The night, night-time. A primary word; 'night'.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To carry, bear, bring; I conduct, lead; perhaps: I make publicly known. A primary verb.
A mixture. From mignumi; a compound.
Myrrh. Apparently strengthened for muron; myrrh.
Aloes, the powdered fragrant aloe wood. Of foreign origin; aloes.
Probably adverb of comparative from hos; which how, i.e. In that manner.
One hundred. Of uncertain affinity; a hundred.
